title: Array translation property
description: This property simply allows to get the value string by the key, value can be an array to help break one-line texts in multiple lines for readability or to reference other translation propertys by their keys

anyOf.title: Reference to an argument of another property processed by a plugin (parametrized translation property)
anyOf.description: Value must refer to a property that is already referenced in this array

anyOf.title: A single part of a plain-string translation property
anyOf.description: Can be a reference key of another translation property

anyOf.title: A reference to a parametrized translation property
anyOf.description: Inserts the parametrized value into the string, provide an object with key that references the property and a value to serve as parameters if applicable. If the key doesn't reference a parametrized property, simply leave the array empty - [].

^.+.title: A reference to a parametrized translation property

^\\d:.+.title: A reference to an argument of another property processed by a plugin (parametrized translation property)
